mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transfer ( sender_id, receiver_id, amount, transfer_time ) VALUES ( #{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{amount}, #{transfer_time} )

INSERT INTO transfer_history (account_id, transfer_with, amount, transfer_type, transfer_time) VALUES
( #{history.account_id}, #{history.transfer_with}, #{history.amount}, #{history.transfer_type}, #{history.transfer_time} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transfer_history WHERE account_id = #{account_id}

SELECT th.account_id, a.account_number, th.amount, th.transfer_type, th.transfer_with, th.transfer_time FROM transfer_history th INNER JOIN accounts a ON th.account_id = a.account_id WHERE th.account_id = #{account_id} ORDER BY th.transfer_time DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{start_idx}
